info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 8:29PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bee County through 900 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mineral, or 12 miles northwest of Beeville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beeville, Mineral, Normanna, Pettus and Tuleta. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 576 and 590. US Highway 59 between mile markers 690 and 692. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
